snippet.title: The Last Hope Trump vs Mafia official steam gameplay
snippet.description:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/581030
The Last Hope: Mafia vs Trump is the sequel of the game “The Last Hope” where you became the president of the world. You are John Trump, the president of all countries from the world. After first days from the investment in this function, you go in Europe at a conference ,but your airplane is shot-down by mafia. Mafia and terrorists from all ex-countries fortify against you. Now you will must to fix the situation, you must to fight with mafia from :
- Countries :France, U.S.A , Turkey, Republic of Moldova, Canada and robots from China made by mafia
- A variety of weapons to fight like sniper, pistol, grenades, sword, etc.
- Transports: Airplane, Limousine, Train
It will be your choise to kill yourself and mafia “take the power of the world” or using the nuclear button kill mafia. But don’t forget that final scope is to create an chaos on earth
